CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 16, 1957, pg. B4 reads: "All Friends Were On Hand - The Lincoln Day dinner at Penn-Sheraton Hotel on Tuesday filled the 17th floor ballroom to capacity with Republicans from all over Allegheny County. Pictured above, left to right:...Table 66, David Thompkins, Anthony Upsher, Margaret Avery, Frances White, Ida Waring, Daisie Wright, Helen Blackwell, Joseph A. James, Alvin McNeal, and George Welch. -Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: David Thompkins, Anthony Upsher, Margaret Avery, Frances White, Ida Waring, Daisie Wright, Helen Blackwell, Joseph A. James, Alvin McNeal, and George Welch, seated at table 66 in Penn Sheraton for Lincoln Day dinner
